title: Initialize Express.js Server for VitaTrack Backend API
instruction: Create the main Express.js server application for VitaTrack backend API. Setup project structure with TypeScript, configure middleware stack (CORS, helmet, compression, rate limiting), implement request/response logging, error handling middleware, and health check endpoints. Configure environment-based settings, graceful shutdown handling, and clustering for production. Setup API versioning, request validation middleware, and response formatting standards. Include Swagger/OpenAPI documentation setup and development tools configuration.
